name: Nightmarefly
description:
You are what you see.
A murky infinite forest full of creepy creatures that strive to drag you into the darkness. All that can scare them away is the light of the Sun. But what if the Sun can't get through the fluid veil of darkness? Maybe you can become the Sun for others? After all, there is an undying shining piece of Sun in each of us...

Design and programming - Tori Cormac - Twitter - VK

Music by PollmixaN
